description:
It might seem a little dry on PS5 exclusives, but thankfully here's 14 upcoming games to keep an eye out for. 

It’s a little dry for PlayStation exclusives this year, but there are plenty on the horizon. From Astro Bot to Death Stranding 2, and a handful of PSVR 2 games, here are 14 upcoming PlayStation exclusives to keep an eye out for. 

Timestamps:
Intro 0:00-:28:09
Astro bot :28:09 - 1:34
Alien Rogue Incursion 1:34-2:19
Behemoth 2:19 - 3:15
Concord 3:15 - 4:16

‘Action Espionage Game’ 9:49 - 10:@4
Outro 10:24 - 10:38
title: 14 Upcoming PS5 Exclusive Games To Keep Your Eye On

description:
The release of Destiny’s Final Shape expansion will mark the end of the franchise’s Light and Darkness saga, as well as a decade of Destiny.

#gaming #Destiny2 #TheFinalShape #gamespot

The game’s ten year plan is often something touted by both its developers and its players as Destiny’s ultimate goal. However, what those ten years look like now is drastically different from what developer Bungie first envisioned. Let’s take a look at the original design for the franchise, and document how that plan quickly unraveled.

Timestamps:
01:06 - Before Destiny
02:25 - The original 10 year plan
02:54 - The original story
04:05 - Destiny
04:56 - Diablo III team save the day
06:15 - The Taken King
07:35 - What was next?
08:42 - Rise of Iron
09:14 - Destiny 2
12:14 - Forsaken
13:19 - Seasons
13:45 - The Activision break up
14:22 - Shadowkeep and New Light
15:40 - COVID
16:10 - The final plan
16:33 - Beyond Light
18:15 - The Witch Queen
18:50 - Lightfall
19:30 - Episode
20:10 - The Final Shape

S
title: How Destiny BARELY Made It 10 Years

description:
We played three hours of From Software's first and only DLC for Elden Ring, and it's shaping up to be special. Check out Tamoor's thoughts on his time with Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree.

#gaming #eldenring #gamespot
title: We Played Elden Ring's New DLC | GameSpot Preview

description:
Today during the Kombat Kast we got a look at Homelander in action against Mileena. This is a match between QA testers at NetherRealm Studios and gives you a good taste of high level play from the upcoming character from The Boys. We even get to see one of his finishers!

#mortalkombat1 #mk #homelander
title: Mortal Kombat 1 - Homelander vs Mileena High Level Gameplay
